feed.title: Immich-Frame Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Immich-Frame: v1.0.9.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

‚ú® New Features

  • Nicer weather icons loaded from assets instead of http requests by @3rob3 in https://github.com/3rob3/ImmichFrame/pull/122
  • Welcome page by @JW-CH in https://github.com/3rob3/ImmichFrame/pull/107
  • Add configurable refresh interval for Albums and People. Closes #123 by @3rob3 in https://github.com/3rob3/ImmichFrame/pull/124

üî® Maintenance

  • Directly use Settings.CurrentSettings by @3rob3 in https://github.com/3rob3/ImmichFrame/pull/121

Full Changelog: https://github.com/3rob3/ImmichFrame/compare/v1.0.8.0...v1.0.9.0

entry.title: New release for Immich-Frame: v1.0.13.0
entry.content:
ImmichFrame goes web! üéâüéâ

With this Version of ImmichFrame, we are releasing an early version of a Webapp. Not all features are fully supported yet, but the backend of the Web-Version and the Client-Apps work the same.

Use the docker package with your existing config for easy access

What's Changed

‚ö†Ô∏è Breaking Changes

  • Use search endpoint for random assets & cache optimizations by @JW-CH in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/143

‚ú® New Features

  • ImmichFrame goes web üéâ by @JW-CH in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/132

üåê immichFrame WebApp

  • Auto-Reload on Web by @JW-CH in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/141
  • Features for web by @JW-CH in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/145
  • Web features / cleanup by @JW-CH in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/147

üìì Documentation

  • Added Raspberry Pi OS autostart instructions by @agdamsbo in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/136

üî® Maintenance

  • Refactoring and API-Support by @JW-CH in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/127
  • Update gitignore by @JW-CH in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/133
  • Changed all the icons by @Blisterexe in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/140
  • Update immich API to v1.117 by @JW-CH in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/149

New Contributors

  • @agdamsbo made their first contribution in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/136
  • @Blisterexe made their first contribution in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/140

Full Changelog: https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/compare/v1.0.12.0...v1.0.13.0

entry.title: New release for Immich-Frame: v1.0.14.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

üåê immichFrame WebApp

  • Feat: Image Transitions by @JW-CH in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/154
  • Fix: Overlay button height by @JW-CH in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/155
  • Feat: Errorpage by @JW-CH in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/156
  • Feat: Metadata & Clock UI changes by @JW-CH in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/158
  • Feat: Zoom-Effect by @JW-CH in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/159

üíªüì± immichFrame ClientApp

  • Adaptive Android icons by @Blisterexe by @3rob3 in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/153
  • Client app image zooming option by @3rob3 in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/161

Full Changelog: https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/compare/v1.0.13.0...v1.0.14.0
